actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to extend the moratorium on conversions of certain depository institutions.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to extend the moratorium of the conversion of savings and loan associations and mutual savings banks from the mutual to the stock form of organization until October 1, 1979.

titles.title: A bill to extend the moratorium on conversions of certain depository institutions.
